Package hms.patient

Class Appointment

Object
Appointment
public class Appointment extends Object
Manages patient appointments in the hospital system. Provides functionalities for scheduling, rescheduling, canceling, viewing appointments, and recording outcomes.

  • Field Summary

    Field

    The timeslot for the appointment in 24 hours e.g., 10:00.

  • Field Details

    • id

      private int id
      The ID of the appointment.

    • patientId

      private String patientId
      The ID of the patient associated with the appointment.

    • doctor

      private String doctor
      The name of the doctor for the appointment.

    • date

      private String date
      The date of the appointment in DD-Mmm-YYY.

    • timeslot

      private String timeslot
      The timeslot for the appointment in 24 hours e.g., 10:00.

    • status

      private String status
      The status of the appointment (e.g., "Pending", "Scheduled", "Completed").

    • rating

      private int rating
      The rating of the appointment given by the patient (e.g., a value between 1 and 5).

    • appointments

      private static List<Appointment> appointments
      Static list to store all appointments.

    • aptOutcomeRecs

      private Map<String,Map<Integer,Map<String,Object>>> aptOutcomeRecs
      Map to store appointment outcome records. Key: Patient ID, Value: A nested map of appointment details where: - Key: Appointment ID - Value: A map containing the appointment details (e.g., date, service type, prescribed medications, notes).

      Constructor to initialize an appointment.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the appointment.
      pid - The ID of the patient.
      doc - The name of the doctor.
      date - The date of the appointment.
      time - The timeslot of the appointment.
      status - The status of the appointment (e.g., "Pending").

    • viewAvailableAppt

      public void viewAvailableAppt(List<Map<String,String>> doctorList, Map<String,Map<String,List<String>>> doctorAvailability)
      Displays all available appointments for doctors.
      Parameters:
      doctorList - A list of doctors and their details.
      doctorAvailability - A map of doctor availability with dates and timeslots.

    • viewAvailableApptByDoc

      public void viewAvailableApptByDoc(String doc, List<Map<String,String>> doctorList, Map<String,Map<String,List<String>>> doctorAvailability)
      Displays available appointments for a specific doctor. The method also calculates and displays the average rating of the doctor.
      Parameters:
      doc - The name of the doctor to check availability for.
      doctorList - A list of maps containing doctor details, such as their name and gender.
      doctorAvailability - A map of doctors' availability, where the key is the doctor's name, and the value is a map with dates as keys and available timeslots as values.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public void scheduleAppointment(Appointment apt, String doc, String date, String ts, Map<String,Map<String,List<String>>> doctorAvailability)
      Schedules a new appointment and updates the doctor's availability.
      Parameters:
      apt - The appointment to schedule.
      doc - The name of the doctor.
      date - The date of the appointment.
      ts - The timeslot of the appointment.
      doctorAvailability - The map of doctor availability.

    • appointmentExists

      public boolean appointmentExists(String pid, int aptId, String type, Map<String,Map<String,List<String>>> doctorAvailability, List<Map<String,String>> doctorList)
      Checks if an appointment exists for a specific patient based on the given appointment ID. If the appointment exists, it displays the details of the appointment and, if the type is "reschedule", also displays the available appointments for the same doctor.
      Parameters:
      pid - The ID of the patient.
      aptId - The ID of the appointment to check.
      type - The type of action to perform ("reschedule" to view available appointments for rescheduling).
      doctorAvailability - A map of doctor availability with dates and timeslots.
      doctorList - A list of maps containing doctor details, such as their name and gender.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment exists, false otherwise.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public void rescheduleAppointment(String pid, int aptId, String newDoc, String date, String time, String dec, Map<String,Map<String,List<String>>> doctorAvailability)
      Reschedules an existing appointment, allowing changes to doctor, date, or timeslot.
      Parameters:
      pid - The ID of the patient.
      aptId - The ID of the appointment to reschedule.
      newDoc - The new doctor's name.
      date - The new date for the appointment.
      time - The new timeslot for the appointment.
      dec - Decision to change the doctor ("yes" to change the doctor).
      doctorAvailability - The map of doctor availability.

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment(String pid, int aptId, Map<String,Map<String,List<String>>> doctorAvailability)
      Cancels an appointment and updates the doctor's availability.
      Parameters:
      pid - The ID of the patient.
      aptId - The ID of the appointment to cancel.
      doctorAvailability - The map of doctor availability.

    • viewScheduledAppointments

      public void viewScheduledAppointments(String pid)
      Displays all scheduled appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      pid - The ID of the patient.

    • viewPastAppointmentOutcomeRecords

      public void viewPastAppointmentOutcomeRecords(String pid)
      Displays the outcome records of past appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      pid - The ID of the patient.

    • rateDoctorAfterAppointment

      public void rateDoctorAfterAppointment(String patientId, int appointmentId, int rating)
      Rates a doctor after a completed appointment.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The ID of the patient.
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment.
      rating - The rating (1-5) for the doctor.
